item.name: Home
item.description: Remember when they said that vegans couldn’t have whipped cream? Well, I’d like to shove this STRAWBERRY HUMMINGBIRD SHORTCAKE WITH WHIPPED CREAM in their pie holes. Join me? I made this for my mom for her birthday. I’ve associated birthday cakes with strawberries and whipped cream since I was a little girl. My mom would […]
